results.title: Hemostatic effects of atorvastatin versus simvastatin.
results.text_hl: We detected @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@prolongation@@@ of the PT with both drugs (p < 0.05); however, @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@prolongation of the PTT@@@ was significant only with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (p < 0.001).

citations.NLM: Kadikoylu G, Yukselen V, Yavasoglu I, Bolaman Z. Hemostatic effects of atorvastatin versus simvastatin. Ann Pharmacother. 2003 Apr;37(4):478-84. PMID: 12659599
citations.BibTeX: @article{12659599, title={Hemostatic effects of atorvastatin versus simvastatin.}, author={Kadikoylu G and Yukselen V and Yavasoglu I and Bolaman Z}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={37}, number={4}, pages={478-84}}

results.title: Effects of simvastatin on cardiac neural and electrophysiologic remodeling in rabbits with hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: APD was longer in HC @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ than in controls (192 +/- 20 ms vs 174 +/- 17 ms; P <.03). Withdrawal and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Statin@@@ groups had less @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@APD prolongation@@@ than HC group.

citations.NLM: Liu YB, Lee YT, Pak HN, Lin SF, Fishbein MC, Chen LS, Merz CN, Chen PS. Effects of simvastatin on cardiac neural and electrophysiologic remodeling in rabbits with hypercholesterolemia. Heart Rhythm. 2009 Jan;6(1):69-75. PMID: 19121803
citations.BibTeX: @article{19121803, title={Effects of simvastatin on cardiac neural and electrophysiologic remodeling in rabbits with hypercholesterolemia.}, author={Liu YB and Lee YT and Pak HN and Lin SF and Fishbein MC and Chen LS and Merz CN and Chen PS}, journal={Heart Rhythm}, volume={6}, number={1}, pages={69-75}}

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on left ventricular mass in hypercholesterolemic rabbits.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: In Langendorff-perfused @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ hearts, @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ led to significant @<m>DISEASE_Long_QT_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008133 @@@QT prolongation@@@ compared with normocholesterolemia, which can be reversed by administering @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee TM, Lin MS, Chou TF, Chang NC. Effect of simvastatin on left ventricular mass in hypercholesterolemic rabbits. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2005 Mar;288(3):H1352-8. PMID: 15486036
citations.BibTeX: @article{15486036, title={Effect of simvastatin on left ventricular mass in hypercholesterolemic rabbits.}, author={Lee TM and Lin MS and Chou TF and Chang NC}, journal={Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol}, volume={288}, number={3}, pages={H1352-8}}
